message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $950,000. I believe this is a fair offer considering the potential benefits you'll reap.
I appreciate your enthusiasm, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but I believe my initial offer is closer to the true value of this product.  Would you consider meeting me halfway at $900,000?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to meet you at $875,000. I believe this is a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.
